mean_en: a group of people who are chosen, usually by a larger group, to make decisions or to deal with a particular subject
sentence: The committee members come together to make decisions for the group they represent.
sentence_trans: 委员会成员代表着他们各自的组织来开会做决议。
word_etyma: com集合，团结 + mitt(mittere)解放 + ee名词后缀，受动者 → committee委员会
